mapper.select: SELECT m.merchant_code AS merchantCode, m.merchant_name AS merchantName, m.business_id AS businessId, c.category_name AS categoryName, c.category_code AS categoryCode, b.brand_code AS brandCode, b.brand_name AS brandName, m.registration_date AS registrationDate, m.termination_date AS terminationDate, m.contract_status AS contractStatus FROM T_Merchant m LEFT JOIN T_Brand b ON m.brand_code = b.brand_code LEFT JOIN T_Category c ON b.category_code = c.category_code ORDER BY m.merchant_code
SELECT merchant_code FROM T_Merchant WHERE merchant_name = #{merchantName} LIMIT 1
